website_summaries.verdict: The compact and portable design on this electric pencil sharpener make it one of the best choices.
pros: Designed with two holes for different sized pencils
Sharpens nicely, but not to the breaking point
Can be plugged into a USB for power
Smaller size makes it compact and easy to take with you
Works on 4 AA batteries when not plugged in
Cutter on the sharpener is replaceable
cons: The sharpeners on this are not as heavy-duty as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Great for colored pencils!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have colored pencils that were in need of a good sharpening. I could not achieve that by hand with kum or prismacolor sharpeners. After some research I came across this one & was immediately happy to see it caterers to colored pencils as well as regular. Many electric helical sharpeners only recommend use for regular. I sharpened my prismacolor verithins & saw immediate results. I even updated my review of those pencils as they are much better to use now. Also works great on soft core premiers.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Renee

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected, but still very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I got this to be portable pencil sharpener because my university doesn't have pencil sharpeners in every classroom. On the one hand, it is larger than I expected. Not significantly, but noticeably. It sharpens pencils excellently, and is easier to use than my $30 pencil sharpener at home. I was disappointed that it uses a traditional power jack instead of a miucro usb connection. Would have been more convenient, as now I have to ensure I never lose the included cable if I don't want to buy batteries. However, all my complaints are nitpicks. So far, it seems like an excellent electric sharpener and for the price you can't do better.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Horrible-don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: they keep sending me emails to change my review and now to remove it. Here’s my change. These were crap and after getting a new set because of my bad review-my mind didn’t change. Those were also crap and didn’t work at all. Quit sending me emails and harassing me to change or delete my HONEST review of your crappy product. I’m a 4th grade teacher and these are not working great at all. Will most likely return them. They get clogged very easily. They don’t sharpen correctly and I had to take the battery out of one of them because it got stuck and wouldn’t keep running even when there was no pencil in it.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Hinson

customer_reviews.title: I like that it doesn't need to be plugged in
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new sharpener for home. Since colored pencils get sharpened the most, I went with this one. It has worked well so far. I like that it doesn't need to be plugged in, so the kids are not messing with a cord. It is compact, so I can put it away when they don't need it. It sharpens to a nice point and doesn't cause breakage in the sharpener. It is also easy for the kids to empty the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Worked well, sharpened all the back to school pencils.
customer_reviews.text: The bin on this is a bit small. After sharpening a dozen pencils it definitely needed to be emptied before I could start the second box. There are two holes, one larger than a standard #2, one smaller... the larger one worried me for small fingers getting stuck in it, so it's living on a high shelf unplugged in between sharpens. Did not seem to have an automatic shutoff, but got the pencils nice and sharp, and could hear a difference in the sound when that happened. Overall, good for the money. If the small fingers thing isn't an issue for you, this would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelloggs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't reach the pencil to sharpen it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many ways to sharpen a pencil and the base doesnt even touch the pencil. One time I got it to barely touch the side of the pencil. I have a normal #2 pencil nothing fancy. I opened it up to check on the sharpener part and be careful because it is not enclosed! So had i actually sharpened a pencil i would have made mess when i took off the front piece! It comes with a cord but not the part you plug into the wall. It is small ish that is about the only good thing about it!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: review changed.  Great customer service and new unit works well.
customer_reviews.text: The little side does not sharpen regular sized pencils to anything but a flat tip. If you want sharp, you have to balance it in the larger side and hope it doesn't snap off. ***The company contacted me regarding my review and replaced the unit when changing out the blades didn't help. I've changed my rating based on the new unit working well and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ami M

customer_reviews.title: THE SmartRO arrived promptly and nicely pkged. I installed 4AA batteries
customer_reviews.text: THE SmartRO arrived promptly and nicely pkged.I installed 4AA batteries, though it comes with a usb cable.I used it on a damaged pointless pencil and finished on a duel point small manual sharpener. The reason I switched was to have more control in sharpening.Its not always the fault of the E sharpener.Some pencils need both types because there delicate.Certain watercolor pencils will sharpened well with E sharpeners others won't.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sharpener!!! I was having a lot of issues with pencils breaking sometimes even before they got back to paper. Since I started using this sharpener I have not had that problem. I love that it’s both electric and battery so I can take it on the go with me while not having to burn through batteries while at home.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Schugel

customer_reviews.title: Does not sharpen anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sharpener for my son who was a pre-k in 2018. We didn't use it much but it was a pain from the beginning since the pencil lid was getting broken inside all the time. After a while, the blades (both of them) became dull while it was not used that much. The price now is much lower that what I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Mitra

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: My son just started 2nd grade and I was tired of sharpening pencils. This is perfect. Not too bulky and easy to use. Sometimes he likes to use the wider pencils and this device has the flexibility of doing both sized pencils. It’s even safe for him to sharpen himself.
customer_reviews.author: Busymami

customer_reviews.title: Small but efficient
customer_reviews.text: My first sharpener didn’t work properly but I was sent a new one by the seller even though I didn’t request one. This new one works much better. If you want a very sharp point on the pencil using battery power is the way to go. It comes with plenty of replacement sharpeners and I really like the option to use the same sharpener on different size pencils.
customer_reviews.author: CICI

customer_reviews.title: Great kids sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener preforms really well. Powered by AA batteries as well as the included cable which fits in a standard USB charger. My only fault is that the point created is a bit shorter than what I'm accustomed to from an electric sharpener. The length of the point is similar to what you'd get from a manual 'twist' sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: A. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sharpener and after a minor problem. They contacted me and sent me a new one free of charge. I wish more sellers had their great service. I am confident in ordering from this seller again and again. The kids at the church love the sharpener, its light and compact. Thanks again for caring enough to help.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best sharpener I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: We've had this sharpener for about three weeks and we love it! We keep it plugged in to our wall charging station and it gets used daily by our six homeschooled kids. Holds plenty of shavings before having to be emptied, too. Pleasantly surprised that the price is so low for what's so far a great little sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, and great customer support
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** The seller was very helpful to correct the issue. Great customer service. I am very satisfied with them and the product. I like that this has a special slot for colored pencils (thicker) but the power cord doesn’t settle in very well to the sharpener so it really lags when trying to sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Powerful and extra blades included
customer_reviews.text: So it took me quite awhile to actually take it out of the box and use it. I didn't expect much , but to my surprise this pencil sharpener is outstanding! It even came with 4 extra blade inserts! It very quiet and plugs into my computer making it totally portable, how cool is that !?.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Got to the point!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an artist. I like sharp pencils. When I need to get a super sharp point on a colored pencil this one does it perfectly. It came with extra sharpeners which I'm happy about. It also worked on several different brands of colored pencils. I admit I was a little worried about using it on my most expensive supplies but was excited that they were sharpened so fabulously.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Reyes

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE TO ORIGINAL POST:  Arrived looking used
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED COMMENTS: Excellent customer service! After posting a negative review, they immediately reached out to me and sent me a new sharpener. Thanks for listening! Will definitely use your company again. ORIGINAL COMMENTS: It works fine and I like the attachments for the different size pencils, but it's scratched and looks like it's been rolling around in someone's backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sharpener because of its price. It works okay but I was hoping it'd be a bit easier for kids to operate. You have to push and hold the pencil down fairly firmly for it to sharpen. I would like one with more power.
customer_reviews.author: Till

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered his pencil sharpener about a month ago for my homeschool room. As a homeschool mom of kids various ages I was excited that it would sharpen regular pencils and primary pencils. When I got he first one he casing was broken so I requested a refund. Once I was issued the refund I ordered a new one. Today I plugged in the new one in an attempt to use it for he first time. Shockingly it doesn’t work. I do NOT even want to try another one. I will choose a different sharpener from a different company when this refund is issued.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Not that good...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after reading good reviews but when recieved, it did not live up to my standards, difficult sharpening pencils, motor turns too slow... beyond return date, dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my temp construction trailer office
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my temp construction trailer office. Work with blue prints daily and having an easy way to sharpen different size pencils and also the USB port charge option is awesome, Definately will bring back to my office desk when job is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Julie N

customer_reviews.title: It actually works with 2 diffrent size pencils!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my grand kids in mind. They use 2 different sizes of pencils. They love sharpening their own pencils, but I still have them sharpen them with me watching.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M Azores

customer_reviews.title: wrong charging cable, no way to contact company but phone
customer_reviews.text: The charging cable doesn't fit the unit. I didn't realize this until after it was too late to return it. Company lists phone number but no email for their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: sadf

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Update to Review 10/11/2018 Seller read review below and I was contacted and provided a replacement. Great customer service and product works great. I am updating my review to show my appreciation. Thank you!! OLD: We have has the opportunity to use this more since school has started. This sharpener does not work well at all and we have changed the batteries 3 times. Extremely disappointed and a waste of money. The smaller sharpener does not sharpen at all....not sure if it's defective.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money they cost! Bought 2. Used them for 3 months already. My son try to sharpen rubber side of the pencil and hit the blade with the pencil's metal ring several times - still working fine
customer_reviews.author: Ivelin

customer_reviews.title: Sharp smooth cuts
customer_reviews.text: Love having the option to use multiple size pencils. Thanks for the extra set of blades. My only problem is that both blades turn all the time
customer_reviews.author: TAM'MAY

customer_reviews.title: Extra blades, great for narrower pencils.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sharpener. I use this mainly for my color pencils. Both the kind for adult coloring books and the kind I use for marking sewing and quilting projects. It was a nice surprise to find it came with extra blades.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie G.

customer_reviews.title: good sharpener for the price
customer_reviews.text: good sharpener for colored pencils and the price is very reasonable, only wish it was a plug in not USB, also suction doesn't work too well and sharpener moves around...
customer_reviews.author: lisa ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Teacher Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for a good sharpener for colored pencils. So many sharpeners have been ruined by colored pencils in my classroom but I have a really good feeling about this one! Plus it came with extra blades- BONUS!
customer_reviews.author: D.Perry

customer_reviews.title: Cool Pencil Sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my son, who is 6, be able to sharpen his pencils. We just plugged it in to the computer and sat it on the desk. Easy enough. Don't have to have batteries. Sharpens more than one size of pencils. Great little sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Best sharpener by battery or plug inn
customer_reviews.text: Quality, 2 sizes pencils, easy to empty, simple, look good and works great. I purchased 3 for grandson, our main home, and our 2nd home.
customer_reviews.author: MGB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: working good, easy to used.but you need a litter more power when you put the pencil in.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: All around a GREAT sharpener
customer_reviews.text: We just recently moved and we now have a tech space. My boys picked this pencil sharpener out solely on the color. I am so pleased with this sharpener. I sharpens so well. I love the two sizes since my kids are always using different writing utinsles. I love that it can be plugged in or use batteries and they sent me extra replacement sharpeners. This is a top notch piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: almost unusable
customer_reviews.text: It came with the wrong cord. It doesn't fit. Missed return. Now can only use with batteries. I bought it for the corded option. Essentially it will end up junk.
customer_reviews.author: Brock5

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS SHARPENER! Works amazing, fast and every time
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener is amazing!!! I’ve gone through quite a few with toddlers/school age and they get hung up and don’t sharpen well and this passes the the kid test 🙌🏼 Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great little sharperner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at work when mine broke unexpectedly. I draw pet portraits and use Prismacolor pencils which have super soft cores. This little guy sharpens them to a nice fine point and is nice to transport back and forth to work. The only complaint I have is that the cord could be longer. I've been using it on batteries just because I don't have an outlet near my desk within reach of the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ray

customer_reviews.title: Don't have to ever look for a pencil sharpener again
customer_reviews.text: Smaller-than-expected Shopkins pencils great 7 year old can do it by herself
customer_reviews.author: gwendolyn maddox

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect the quality to be very high for a USB powered sharpener: but it felt as professional as those used in my office. Would recommend for folks to stop using hand sharpeners and to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Nana
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sharpener for my grandkids and the ease and versatility. The ability to change for various size pencils is an awesome feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nana times ten

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size and it's cute but it doesn't sharpen well
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener barely sharpens pencils. I get a tiny point and I have to hold the pencil and turn it and wiggle it to get it to sharpen at all. I've never had an electric sharpener that sharpened so poorly. It's a good size and it's cute but it doesn't sharpen well.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Reader

customer_reviews.title: No more pencil sharpening for me!
customer_reviews.text: No more nagging from my wife, who is incapable of taking a knife and sharpening a pencil. My 8 year old can operate this. Simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Chad J. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: One side of pencil sharpener stopped working after 1 month... just after the return window closed. Unfortunately, it was the larger side, which was the whole reason for buying this particular sharpener! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalPeach

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work on all pencils. Some fit perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work on all pencils. Some fit perfectly but some seem to be too small for it so it doesn't turn to sharpen the pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tool. It is powerful and works very well. I love that no batteries are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cbonnie

customer_reviews.title: This works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great!!! Haven't used it with batteries yet, but the USB charge works great and gets my pencils good and sharp
customer_reviews.author: Talitha

customer_reviews.title: Great little sharpner
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then what you may think, plenty of power and works well for a college student. Would buy a again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Product works perfectly fine. Only thing is the adapter doesn’t go fully inside the pencil sharpener not enough of a concern to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Works as should. Kids can use it. Came with extra blades.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little electric sharpener. Love that it has two sizes and extra parts too
customer_reviews.author: Funsized

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love having the choice of size sharpening in a easy and convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: lpb

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son's teacher and she asked where ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's teacher and she asked where it came from because her Friends at school want one too!
customer_reviews.author: Channell C.

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!!! Im very particular when it comes to my tools. Powerful, good size, nothing superfluous, sharpens larger pencils and your typical #2, plus comes with extra cutters and a usb cord. Im going to order a second to have in my shop. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. You do have to hold it down. Sharpens in record time almost as good as a Swingline electric.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap pencil sharpener, this thing is awesome. Zero complaints at all. It's small but mighty!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Danner

customer_reviews.title: Love this sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Comes with extra sharpener/blades. You can use batteries or connect it to a USB port to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: can be plugged into your computer!!!
customer_reviews.text: pretty color sharpens to s really good point 2 sharpeners
customer_reviews.author: luv2shopamazon

customer_reviews.title: Keeping My Pencils Sharpened
customer_reviews.text: The sharpener gets alot of use in this house as I enjoy coloring with pencils. Compact for easy travel. Extra blades are a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Craig

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves you can use from an USB port. It helps him keep his pencils sharp and ready for action.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Duran

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sharpener! I've had it for a month and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sharpener! I've had it for a month and it's going strong. I have five kids, so it gets a lot of use. It works great for colored pencils, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with our new sharpener.. if there is an issue with the product... customers service was suppppper fantastic.. i greatly appreciate all the help and quick response.. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: erica pooran

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sharpener and it is great that it has extra heads.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Happy sharpening!
customer_reviews.text: very pleased !! Was happy to see included with extra sharpeners.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Good power, and comes with additional blades.
customer_reviews.author: Spyder

customer_reviews.title: Quit working already
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener worked good when I got it and it’s quit working already Wouldn’t buy it without the warranty again
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working with batteries after a month
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the product for a little over a month and it now only works when plugged in to the wall. I’ve replaced the batteries but it doesn’t make a difference. It still works but is far less convenient now that it has to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip W

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens well and portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable sharpener. It was easily put together and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for colored pencils
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sharpener for colored pencils! Kid friendly. Doesn’t come with a USB charger.

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for small kids, not if you like fine point. A bit disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality sharpener. Stops working well after a month.😯
customer_reviews.author: Loalmos

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Like the option to plug in or use batteries. Good size for a small desk. Like the two options for different sized pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice USB charger
customer_reviews.text: Cute for your desk! Sharpens the pencils well and even! The USB charger is really handy sticks writing your laptop. I’ll still miss the old school pencil sharpener that gave you an excuse to leave your desk in grade school.
customer_reviews.author: Joy P.

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The first sharpener I received did not work well. SMARTRO reached out to me and offered to replace the sharpener. They have shown great care and customer service. I would say it's and average to good sharpener, for a great price, with excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: It is a powerful pencil sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome for the price! It is used to sharpen pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Tony K.

customer_reviews.title: It sharpens very well....
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can attach it to my laptop or not which is quite handy.....
customer_reviews.author: greentree

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Unit came, I put batteries in it and after one use it went crazy. The only way to stop it from continuing to grind was to take the batteries out. I called the number on the package and left a voice mail. They never returned my call. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: LCarlson

customer_reviews.title: Great family sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with our sharpener ! Works great and excellent customer service from the company

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Works great and comes with 2 sets of replacement sharpeners.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: This product was attractive, works well and was a good value.

customer_reviews.title: It works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sharpener. Works better than expected. Love the additional blades that came with it.

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it gives you 2 replacement cutters. I wonder how long a set of batteries would last but plugging into my laptop works great.

customer_reviews.title: Double check the battery contact
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that I can’t use it with battery.

customer_reviews.title: this is the best sharpener ever”
customer_reviews.text: 11 years old daughter, “dad, this is the best sharpener ever”! Enough said.

customer_reviews.title: That is the best sharpener I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Holy pencil sharpener!!!! That is the best sharpener I've ever seen. Gets em tack sharp, and my kid can operate it just fine. So nice!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Product is very durable. Can be used battery operated or wired. My son is happy.

customer_reviews.title: Both batteries and charger
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect first tool for my new kindergartener. Since it can be charged or use batteries it is child appropriate. It also has two different sizes so as he learns to write he can sharpen either size pencils. It gives him independence to prepare his own pencil case for learning.

customer_reviews.text: Did not sharpen pencil to a point. Had to send back.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two months
customer_reviews.text: Broke after two months. Just stopped working. I’ve tried to mess with it to figure out why, but no luck.

customer_reviews.text: it just worked so well you have to get it because i love it and you will to : )

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good sharpening machine, it also come with extra sharpening adapters.

customer_reviews.text: Works well as a sharpener. Can injure a child's finger.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for the kids. Nice and compact for storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SMARTRO Electric Pencil Sharpener, Best USB or Battery Operated for No.2 and Colored Pencil
feature_bullets: DOUBLE HOLE DESIGN & SOLID: Powerful enough to sharpen every pencil to a perfect and durable point in only 3-5 seconds with ease, especially for No. 2 pencils & colored pencils. Two holes for 6-8mm and 9-12mm diameter pencils separately.
COMPACT & PORTABLE: Easy to transport. An ideal choice for artists, students, professors, engineers, architects, and fashion designers of all ages, making drawing, writing, and coloring much easier.
KID-FRIENDLY: It won't operate if the cover is removed or is not installed correctly, which means that it won't hurt your kid's finger when he or she is using it in classroom.

BEST USB OR BATTERY OPERATED: The sharpener is powered by a standard USB outlet, 4 AA batteries or adapter. To avoid the potential insecurity of plug-in for kids, the adapter is not included, but it is highly recommended that a 5V 2A adapter be used to get more strong power.

TOP PRIORITY PERFORMANCE: Longer lifespan, the cutter within the sharpener is replaceable. Easy to clean by simply removing the cover and dusting away the shavings. Package includes: 1 x electric pencil sharpener, 2 x cutters, and 1 x USB cable (Batteries not included)
